overview:
Peter Bishop is the commensurate software engineer turned tech entrepreneur. He has designed and developed multiple high volume, customer facing systems and has successfully cashed out of one of them (in 2001 no less!).

Currently, Peter is CEO of Repatoo, a pre-money start-up taking on the challenges of online reputation management. Repatoo’s current offering allows online auction users to aggregate and transport their auction feedback to create an instant presence where ever they decide to interact online. However, Peter sees the current Repatoo service as the ‘gateway drug’ introducing the public to the idea of personal reputation on the Internet and the first stepping stone to addressing a much greater problem.
